name: "An Untitled Zombie Game"
description:
"An untitled zombie game" is a first person zombie survival shooter game which takes inspiration from Call of Duty: Black Ops Zombies.

Make your way through the rounds and buy perks to increase your mobility, with multiple mechanics such as upgradable weapons and doors to open, there isn't a shortage of things to do in "AUZG", purchase the electricity and make your way to the time machine to go back to reality and finish the story. There are also a couple of Easter eggs scattered around so be on the look out as they can give you a quick boost of cash.

Quotes Alex (naughty corner games owner) - " When I was first introduced to "AUZG" I was in the darkest point of my life. my husband had just left me, my son put me up for adoption and I was into cock and ball torture practices (I still am). But ever since the release of "AUZG" nothing has changed. I am planning on ending it all, this game prevented my incoming demise for a few weeks but now the voices are getting to me and I cannot go on while knowing the terrible acts I have committed (read the bible its a long story). thank you LARGEUZIVERT for letting me get a shitty demo version of "AUZG"." Lord Finnigus The Great (naughty corner games representative ) - "Untitled Zombie Game is one of the most ambitious and influential games of this generation and deserves more praise. However, the game seems to be lacking deez nuts." Me(Me) - "Burh" not Alex (not Alex) - "im not Alex" Leo(cringe) - "Game of the year" Doug(cool) - "Would have been better if came to class on time everyday" Doug(cool) - "#1 amount of time spent in naughty corner" Ivan(Pro Discord Mod) - "It has Walter White in it I thought it was pretty cool" Alex Pannell (homie/ homo) - "We're gay, that's why"Antek (pog) - "Was gonna say A tier but Walter White reference makes it an instant S"
